com.compendium.core.datamodel
Interface IView

All Superinterfaces:
ICoreConstants, IIdObject, INodeSummary, IPCObject, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
View
public interface IView
extends INodeSummary

The IView is an interface object that represents a collection of nodes and links. The visual representation of the nodes and links depends on the type of the view.

addMemberNode

NodePosition addMemberNode(int nType,
                           java.lang.String sXNodeType,
                           java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                           java.lang.String sAuthor,
                           java.lang.String sLabel,
                           java.lang.String sDetail,
                           int x,
                           int y)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                  ModelSessionException
Adds a new node with the given properties to this view at the given x and y coordinate, both locally and in the DATABASE.

Parameters:
int - nType, the type of this node.
String - sXNodeType, the extended node type id of the node - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
String - sOriginalID, the original id of the node if it was imported.
String - sAuthor, the author of the node.
String - sLabel, the label of this node.
String - sDetail, the first page of detail for this node.
x, - The X coordinate of the node in the view
y, - The Y coordinate of the node in the view
Returns:
the NodePosition object if the node was successfully added, otherwise null.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
ModelSessionException

                           boolean bShowText,
                           boolean bShowTrans,
                           boolean bShowWeight,
                           boolean bSmallIcon,
                           boolean bHideIcon,
                           int nWrapWidth,
                           int nFontSize,
                           java.lang.String sFontFace,
                           int nFontStyle,
                           int nForeground,
                           int nBackground)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                  ModelSessionException
Adds a new node with the given properties to this view at the given x and y coordinate, both locally and in the DATABASE.

Parameters:
nType - the type of this node.
sXNodeType - the extended node type id of the node - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
sImportedID - the imported id,
sOriginalID - the original id of the node.
sAuthor - the author of the node.
creationDate - the date the node was created.
modDate - the date the node was last modified.
sLabel - the label of this node.
sDetail - the first page of detail for this node.
x - The X coordinate of the node in the view.
y - The Y coordinate of the node in the view.
transCreationDate - the date the node was put into the view.
transModDate - the date the view-node data was last modified.
sLastModAuthor - the author name of the current user.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
ModelSessionException

addMemberLink

                    int arrow)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                           ModelSessionException
Adds a new link with the given properties to this view, both locally and in the DATABASE.

Parameters:
type - The link type of the link to be added to the view
sOriginalID, - The original imported id
String - author, the author of the link.
from - The link's originating node
to - The link's destination node
arrow, - the type of arrow to draw.
Returns:
the link if the link was successfully added, null otherwise

addMemberLink

ILink addMemberLink(java.lang.String type,
                    java.lang.String sImportedID,
                    java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                    java.lang.String author,
                    INodeSummary from,
                    INodeSummary to,
                    java.lang.String sLabel,
                    int arrow)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                           ModelSessionException
Adds a new link with the given properties to this view, both locally and in the DATABASE.

Parameters:
type - The link type of the link to be added to the view.
sImportedID, - the imported id.
sOriginalID, - The original imported id
String - author, the author of the link.
from - The link's originating node.
to - The link's destination node.
sLabel, - the label for this link.
arrow, - the type of arrow to draw.
Returns:
the link if the link was successfully added, null otherwise
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
ModelSessionException
